paragraphs.title: Dataset download
paragraphs.text:
%sh

GEONAMES_DIR=/tmp/geonames

mkdir -p $GEONAMES_DIR
cd $GEONAMES_DIR

if [ ! -f countryInfo.txt ]
then
  wget "http://download.geonames.org/export/dump/countryInfo.txt"
fi

if [ ! -f allCountries.txt ]
then
  wget http://download.geonames.org/export/dump/allCountries.zip
  unzip allCountries.zip
fi

result.msg: continents: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [continent_geoname_id: int, continent_code: string, continent_name: string]

paragraphs.title: CountryInfo
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._

val countryInfoSchema = StructType(Seq(
    StructField("iso", StringType, false),
    StructField("iso3", StringType, false),
    StructField("iso_numeric", StringType, false),
    StructField("fips", StringType, true),
    StructField("name", StringType, false),
    StructField("capital", StringType, true),
    StructField("area", DoubleType, true),
    StructField("population", StringType, false), // BigInt
    StructField("continent", StringType, false),
    StructField("tld", StringType, false),
    StructField("currencyCode", StringType, false),
    StructField("currencyName", StringType, false),
    StructField("phone", StringType, true),
    StructField("postalCodeFormat", StringType, true),
    StructField("postalCodeRegex", StringType, true),
    StructField("languages", StringType, true),
    StructField("geoname_id", IntegerType, true),
    StructField("neighbours", StringType, true),
    StructField("equivalentFipsCode", StringType, true)))

val countryInfoCsv = reader.schema(countryInfoSchema).load(s"$GeonamesDir/countryInfo.txt").persist(org.apache.spark.storage.StorageLevel.MEMORY_ONLY_SER)
countryInfoCsv.registerTempTable("countryInfo")

paragraphs.title: Load CSV
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._

val geonamesSchema = StructType(Seq(
    StructField("geoname_id", IntegerType, false),
    StructField("name", StringType, false),
    StructField("ascii_name", StringType, false),
    StructField("inlineAlternateNames", StringType, false),
    StructField("latitude", FloatType, false),
    StructField("longitude", FloatType, false),
    StructField("feature_class", StringType, false), // Char
    StructField("feature_code", StringType, false),
    StructField("country_iso", StringType, false),
    StructField("inlineAlternateCountryCodes", StringType, false),
    StructField("admin_1_code", StringType, false),
    StructField("admin2Code", StringType, true),
    StructField("admin3Code", StringType, true),
    StructField("admin4Code", StringType, true),
    StructField("population", StringType, false), // BigInt
    StructField("elevation", IntegerType, true),
    StructField("dem", IntegerType, false),
    StructField("timeZone", StringType, false),
    StructField("modificationDate", DateType, false)))

val allCountriesCsv = reader.schema(geonamesSchema).load(s"$GeonamesDir/allCountries.txt").persist(org.apache.spark.storage.StorageLevel.MEMORY_ONLY_SER)
